message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think you'll really love it! As we're just getting started, I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us off on the right foot. I'm proposing a price of $10,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a price of $9,500 for the product. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the product's worth.
